name: Drink Pro Tycoon
description: In Drink Pro Tycoon you create your dreams company and dominate world drink industry. Create best drinks and make best advertisement campaigns. Invent newest technologies and market your drinks in the best way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: Yes Additional Notes: Supports every resolution.
